languages.text: "На данный момент это все. Вы направлялись на корабль? Или у вас еще остались дела на Футфоле? Как бы то ни было, я могу подождать вас на борту или же сопроводить в составе вашей свиты".

traits.locale_text: "На данный момент это все. Вы направлялись на корабль? Или у вас еще остались дела на Футфоле? Как бы то ни было, я могу подождать вас на борту или же сопроводить в составе вашей свиты".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."
languages.original_text: "На данный момент это все. Вы направлялись на корабль? Или у вас еще остались дела на Футфоле? Как бы то ни было, я могу подождать вас на борту или же сопроводить в составе вашей свиты".

traits.locale_text: "For the time being, that would be all. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you onboard or accompany you to a different destination."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For the time being, that would be all. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you onboard or accompany you to a different destination."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you onboard or accompany you as part of your retinue."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you onboard or accompany you as part of your retinue."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「話は以上。そろそろ船に向かわないか？それとも、フットフォールでの用事が残っているとか？いずれにせよ、船上であなたを待つことも、従者として同行することも可能だ」
languages.original_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「話は以上。そろそろ船に向かわないか？それとも、フットフォールでの用事が残っているとか？いずれにせよ、船上であなたを待つことも、従者として同行することも可能だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我要说的事情只有这些了。你要回到船上吗？或者说，你在落脚港还有事情要处理？无论是哪种情况，我都可以回到船上等你，也可以作为你的随行人员陪在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: “我要说的事情只有这些了。你要回到船上吗？或者说，你在落脚港还有事情要处理？无论是哪种情况，我都可以回到船上等你，也可以作为你的随行人员陪在你身边。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Eso es todo, de momento. ¿Se dirige a la nave? ¿O es que aún tiene asuntos pendientes en Paso? Sea cual sea el caso, puedo {mf|esperarle|esperarla} a bordo o {mf|acompañarle|acompañarla} como parte de su séquito».
languages.original_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es todo, de momento. ¿Se dirige a la nave? ¿O es que aún tiene asuntos pendientes en Paso? Sea cual sea el caso, puedo {mf|esperarle|esperarla} a bordo o {mf|acompañarle|acompañarla} como parte de su séquito».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sera tout pour le moment. Allez-vous retourner au vaisseau ou avez-vous encore à faire à Castel ? Dans tous les cas, je peux soit vous attendre à bord, soit vous accompagner en me joignant à votre entourage. »
languages.original_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sera tout pour le moment. Allez-vous retourner au vaisseau ou avez-vous encore à faire à Castel ? Dans tous les cas, je peux soit vous attendre à bord, soit vous accompagner en me joignant à votre entourage. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das wäre für den Moment alles. Seid Ihr unterwegs zum Schiff? Oder habt Ihr auf Footfall noch etwas zu erledigen? Wie auch immer, ich kann an Bord auf Euch warten oder Euch als Teil Eures Gefolges begleiten."
languages.original_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre für den Moment alles. Seid Ihr unterwegs zum Schiff? Oder habt Ihr auf Footfall noch etwas zu erledigen? Wie auch immer, ich kann an Bord auf Euch warten oder Euch als Teil Eures Gefolges begleiten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdilik diyeceklerim bu kadar. İstikamet gemi mi yoksa Binliman'da başka işlerin var mı? Dilersen gemide bekleyebilir veya maiyetine katılarak sana eşlik edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "That is everything for the time being. Are you headed to the ship? Or do you still have business on Footfall? Whatever the case, I can either wait for you on board or accompany you as part of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdilik bu kadar. Gemiye mi gidiyorsunuz yoksa Binliman'da başka işleriniz mi var? Dilerseniz sizi gemide bekleyebilirim veya maiyetinize katılarak size eşlik edebilirim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
